actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for starting an Actor run. Includes the first 20 articles processed and analyzed.

article-fetch.eventDescription: Price per article processed. This covers the cost of calling the Apify Google Search Results Scraper to acquire the AI Overview summary.

llm-analysis-tokens-used.eventDescription: Price per 1,000 tokens used for the combined LLM analysis (Sentiment, Category, Entities). This covers both the prompt and the structured JSON output.

article-summary.eventDescription: Fee per article processed beyond the initial 20 articles included in the base fee.
